# <code>[pixi](../pixi.md) lock</code>

## About
Solve environment and update the lock file without installing the environments

--8<-- "docs/reference/cli/pixi/lock_extender:description"

## Usage
```
pixi lock [OPTIONS]
```

## Solver Options
- <a id="arg---exclude-newer" href="#arg---exclude-newer">`--exclude-newer <DATE>`</a>
:  Exclude any packages that have been created after the given date
<br>**env**: `PIXI_EXCLUDE_NEWER`
- <a id="arg---json" href="#arg---json">`--json`</a>
:  Output the changes in JSON format

## Global Options
- <a id="arg---manifest-path" href="#arg---manifest-path">`--manifest-path <MANIFEST_PATH>`</a>
:  The path to `pixi.toml`, `pyproject.toml`, or the workspace directory

--8<-- "docs/reference/cli/pixi/lock_extender:example"
